references.paper_title: Imagenet classification with deep convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper is foundational in the field of deep learning and its impact on image recognition is significant to the field of domain adaptation.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: Deep residual networks are a key architectural innovation that allows for the training of significantly deeper networks, improving the performance of several deep learning tasks, and relevant to domain adaptation.
The Transformer architecture, introduced in this paper, has revolutionized the field of natural language processing and has implications for other deep learning areas, including domain adaptation.

This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning, covering its foundations, key architectures, and applications, which is highly relevant to the development of domain adaptation methods.
This paper provides a comprehensive overview of transfer learning, covering its various techniques and applications, which is highly relevant to the development of domain adaptation methods.
